body_html: Maybe this holds only for me but I got it solved. I defined the graph using keras. The problem was I called K.learning_phase(0) after defining the graph. This led to the above error. When calling K.learning_phase(0) before defining the model it works :)
body_text: Maybe this holds only for me but I got it solved. I defined the graph using keras. The problem was I called K.learning_phase(0) after defining the graph. This led to the above error. When calling K.learning_phase(0) before defining the model it works :)
body: Maybe this holds only for me but I got it solved. I defined the graph using keras. The problem was I called K.learning_phase(0) *after* defining the graph. This led to the above error. When calling K.learning_phase(0) before defining the model it works :)
